name: 楊元森
objective:
本課程主要教授學生力法、位法及矩陣之基本應用：(1) 傾角變位法、(2) 力矩分配法、(3) 能與補能之觀念、(4) 矩陣結構力法、(5) 矩陣結構變位法、(6) 直接勁度法、(7) 結構穩定之介紹 。
Fundamental theory of statically indeterminate structures; analysis of indeterminate beams, frames, and trusses by stiffness and flexibility methods; study of influence lines for beams, frames, and trusses.
schedule:
Week 1: Deflection using Energy Methods (1)
Week 2: Deflection using Energy Methods (2)
Week 3: Force Method on Statically Indeterminate Structures (1) General Procedure
Week 4: Force Method on Statically Indeterminate Structures (2) Maxwell's Theorem and Betti's Law
Week 5: Force Method on Statically Indeterminate Structures (3): Exercises on Beams and Frames
Week 6: Force Method on Statically Indeterminate Structures (4): Exercises on Beams, Frames, and Trusses
Week 7: Force Method on Statically Indeterminate Structures (5): Symmetric Structures
Week 8: Force Method on Statically Indeterminate Structures (5): Influence Lines
Week 9: Midterm
Week 10: Review and exercises
Week 11: Displacement Method: Slope-Deflection Equations
Week 12: Displacement Method: Moment-Distribution
Week 13: Stiffness Method: Trusses / Coordinate Transformation (1)
Week 14: Stiffness Method: Trusses / Coordinate Transformation (2)
Week 14: Stiffness Method: Beams
Week 15: Stiffness Method: Plane Frame 
Week 16: Basic Finite Element Method (1): Rayleigh's method
Week 17: Basic Finite Element Method (2): Computer implementation
Week 18: Final Examination
scorePolicy:
Midterm: 30% +/- 5%
Final Exam: 40% +/- 5%
Assignments, lecture notes, interactions etc.: 30% +/- 5%

covid19.courseScoreMethod: Under the premise of the government and university regulations, the lecture will try to carry out the midterm and final examination online through Google Meet with all attendees' webcam on. He will try to run a rehearsal prior to the midterm and final examination. The online examination will be close book.
covid19.courseInfo: Under the premise of the government and university regulations, the lecture will try to give lecture online through Google Meet. Online instant quiz can be a part of semester grading. There is no makeup quiz if you miss the online instant quiz. Lecture videos will be announced at NTUT iStudy (北科 i 學園 PLUS).
covid19.contactInfo: Email to ysyang@ntut.edu.tw  with title of "About NTUT Course: Structural Analysis (II), from 108340xxx (your student ID)" or 「有關 結構學 (二), 學生學號 108340xxx (你的學號)」. Email without correctly formatted title could be ignored.
covid19.additionalInfo: You need to use the Google account given by NTUT (which typically is 108340xxx@ntut.org.tw) to attend the online lecture and examinations.
